<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/mogu/oll.gif" smilieid="1062" border="0" alt="">内网旧电脑电池没电了，又不想换，那就搭建内网NTP服务器吧<br>
<br>
首先准备时间准确的电脑主机<br>
<br>
<strong><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">【保存以下代码为bat，管理员运行】</font></font></strong><br>
主机设置：<br>
1.开启NTP服务<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\W32Time\TimeProviders\NtpServer" /v Enabled /t REG_DWORD /d 0x1 /f</pre></div><br>
<br>
2.设置参数<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\W32Time\Config" /v AnnounceFlags /t REG_DWORD /d 0x5 /f</pre></div><br>
<br>
3.启动w32time服务<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">net stop w32time &amp;&amp; net start w32time</pre></div><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">【为了大家设置，这里编写了bat,一键设置客户端同步NTP地址】</font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">修改192.168.1.1为自己内网NTP服务器IP地址</font></font><br>
客户端设置：<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">@echo off

echo 正在将时间同步服务器修改为 【192.168.1.1】，请稍候...

reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\W32Time\Parameters" /v NtpServer /t REG_SZ /d "192.168.1.1,0x1" /f &gt; nul

net stop w32time &gt; nul
net start w32time &gt; nul

echo 时间同步服务器已经修改为 192.168.1.1。
pause
</pre></div><br>
